parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the quota item.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of records that can be returned for the query. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 30.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token that marks the position from which you want to start the query.

> If you leave this parameter empty, the query starts from the beginning.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description:
The abbreviation of the Alibaba Cloud service name.

>  To query the abbreviation of an Alibaba Cloud service name, call the [ListProducts](~~440555~~) operation and check the value of `ProductCode` in the response.

parameters.name: QuotaCategory
parameters.description:
The quota type. Valid values:

*   CommonQuota: general quota.
*   WhiteListLabel: whitelist quota.
*   FlowControl: API rate limit.
